33.ara-name: كتاب الفتن عن رسول الله صلى الله عليه وسلم

hadiths.text: Abu Hurairah narrated that the Prophet (s.a.w) said:"Whoever points a piece of iron at his brother, the angels curse him

chapter.ara-name: باب مَا جَاءَ فِي إِشَارَةِ الْمُسْلِمِ إِلَى أَخِيهِ بِالسِّلاَحِ
chapter.eng-name: What has been related about a Muslim pointing a weapon at his brother
